class.name: DelegateDoubleMatrix1D

javadoc.text: * 1-d matrix holding double elements; either a view wrapping another 2-d matrix and therefore delegating calls to it.
javadoc.author: wolfgang.hoschek@cern.ch

javadoc.text:
* Returns the matrix cell value at coordinate index. *
Provided with invalid parameters this method may return invalid objects without throwing any exception. * You should only use this method when you are absolutely sure that the coordinate is within bounds. * Precondition (unchecked): index<0 || index>=size().
javadoc.param: index the index of the cell.
javadoc.return: the value of the specified cell.

javadoc.text: * Construct and returns a new empty matrix of the same dynamic type as the receiver, having the specified size. * For example, if the receiver is an instance of type DenseDoubleMatrix1D the new matrix must also be of type DenseDoubleMatrix1D, * if the receiver is an instance of type SparseDoubleMatrix1D the new matrix must also be of type SparseDoubleMatrix1D, etc. * In general, the new matrix should have internal parametrization as similar as possible.
javadoc.param: size the number of cell the matrix shall have.
javadoc.return: a new empty matrix of the same dynamic type.

javadoc.text: * Construct and returns a new 2-d matrix of the corresponding dynamic type, entirelly independent of the receiver. * For example, if the receiver is an instance of type DenseDoubleMatrix1D the new matrix must be of type DenseDoubleMatrix2D, * if the receiver is an instance of type SparseDoubleMatrix1D the new matrix must be of type SparseDoubleMatrix2D, etc.
javadoc.param: rows the number of rows the matrix shall have.
columns the number of columns the matrix shall have.
javadoc.return: a new matrix of the corresponding dynamic type.

javadoc.text:
* Sets the matrix cell at coordinate index to the specified value. *
Provided with invalid parameters this method may access illegal indexes without throwing any exception. * You should only use this method when you are absolutely sure that the coordinate is within bounds. * Precondition (unchecked): index<0 || index>=size().
javadoc.param: index the index of the cell.
value the value to be filled into the specified cell.

class.comment: The row this view is bound to.
